alert.note: Alert for Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 23 at 5:55AM MST until February 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 to 50 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 to 40 below zero. * WHERE...Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains and Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 11 AM MST this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 11 AM this morning to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County
